com.twitter.heron.metricscachemgr

Class MetricsCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.metricscachemgr.MetricsCacheManager

  • public class MetricsCacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
    main entry for metrics cache manager MetricsCacheManager holds three major objects: 1.MetricsCache metricsCache: it is the store where metrics and exceptions are cached. 2.MetricsCacheManagerServer metricsCacheManagerServer: it accepts the metric message from sink. 3.MetricsCacheManagerHttpServer metricsCacheManagerHttpServer: it responds to queries.

      • MetricsCacheManager

        public MetricsCacheManager(java.lang.String topologyName,

                           int statsPort,
                           SystemConfig systemConfig,
                           MetricsSinksConfig metricsSinkConfig,
                           Config configExpand,
                           TopologyMaster.MetricsCacheLocation metricsCacheLocation)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor: MetricsCacheManager needs 4 type information: 1. Servers: host and 2 ports 2. Topology: name 3. Config: heron config, sink config, and cli config 4. State: location node to be put in the state-mgr
        Parameters:
        topologyName - topology name
        serverHost - server host
        masterPort - port to accept message from sink
        statsPort - port to respond to query request
        systemConfig - heron config
        metricsSinkConfig - sink config
        configExpand - other config
        metricsCacheLocation - location for state mgr
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
